{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPQ865 |est_release_date=02/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=36-57 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla2=128 |ram1=512 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |stock_boot=CompexWRT |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|WPQ865 Embedded Board}} :[http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpq865/ Product page] ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 ARM @1.7GHz CPU *1GB DDR3 System Memory *256MB NAND Flash *32MB NOR Flash *3x Mini PCI Express v2.0 slot *2x Gigabit LAN RJ45 with Auto-MDI/X *1x USB 3.0 port *2x SIM holder *Integrated 48-57V 802.3af/at PoE ===Applications=== *Optimized for 4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac module support *Tri-Band MU-MIMO 802.11abgn/ac Access Point *Dual Concurrent MU-MIMO 802.11an/ac Access Point *Wireless Base Station *3G/LTE AP ===Ordering Configuration=== 
Item Code		        Chipset	         Board Information
WPQ865 6B02PR32F1GBR-TE         IPQ8065          CPU board with 3 MiniPCIe slot
